job.title: Data Analyst
job.description: <p><strong><u>About Mobinity Global:</u></strong></p><p>Mobinity Global is transforming the way recruiting is done in the digital age. We work with a number of top tier companies, tech startups, freelance companies, Industry professionals and subject matter experts for projects, internships, jobs and freelance work.</p><p>If you meet the below <strong><u>eligibility criteria</u></strong>, please apply and our recruitment team will contact you through LinkedIn to get you started. We plan to build a strong connection with all of our applicants so that we can facilitate both our employment partners and potential employers now as well as in the future.</p><p><br></p><p><strong><u>Eligibility Criteria:</u></strong></p><ol><li>Your year of graduation is 2020 or later.<strong>(Masters Candidates can also apply)</strong></li><li>You have a bachelor's degree in business/ economics/ finance/ Computer Science / Statistics major from a USA university.</li><li>You have an aspiration to work for companies such as Dell, Citadel, Qualtrics, PNC, Venture for America, RippleMatch, SAP, Robinhood etc.</li></ol><p><br></p><p><strong><u><span class="ql-cursor"></span>Description:</u></strong></p><p>Apply your knowledge of data analysis to real-world modelling, analysis, and report with our experienced analyst team.</p><p><br></p><p><strong><u>Data Analyst Duties and Responsibilities:</u></strong></p><ul><li>Using advanced computerized models to extract the data needed</li><li>Removing corrupted data</li><li>Performing initial analysis to assess the quality of the data</li><li>Performing further analysis to determine the meaning of the data</li><li>Performing final analysis to provide additional data screening</li><li>Preparing reports based on analysis and presenting them to management</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong><u>Requirements:</u></strong></p><ul><li>A high level of mathematical ability</li><li>Programming languages, such as SQL, Oracle and Python</li><li>The ability to analyze, model and interpret data</li><li>Problem-solving skills</li><li>A methodical and logical approach</li><li>The ability to plan work and meet deadlines</li><li>Accuracy and attention to detail</li><li>Interpersonal skills</li><li>Teamworking skills</li><li>Written and verbal communication skills</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong><u>Benefits:</u></strong></p><ul><li>Shadowing, mentoring, and training opportunities.</li><li>Hands-on application of finance principles in a fast-paced work environment</li><li>Opportunity to attend weekly meetings and occasional networking events</li><li>Compensation available</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong><u>Apply NOW and we'll get you started to explore your best matches!</u></strong></p>
